memberdef.name: psleft
memberdef.initializer: {xval = xcoord * 7570; yval = ycoord * 10500;\ snprintf (psbuf, sizeof(psbuf),\ "%d %d M (%s) SL\n", xval, yval, ps_string);\ pscat (psbuf);}

memberdef.name: psright
memberdef.initializer: {xval = xcoord * 7570; yval = ycoord * 10500;\ snprintf (psbuf, sizeof(psbuf),\ "%d %d M (%s) SR\n", xval, yval, ps_string);\ pscat (psbuf);}

memberdef.argsstring: (struct scan_struct *root, struct type_pass *pass, char *fringename, char *pplot, double tickinc)
memberdef.name: generate_text
